alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ALLEGHANY COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN NORTH CAROLINA AND SOUTHEASTERN GRAYSON COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN VIRGINIA THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Troutdale, or near Sugar Grove, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Independence... Mouth Of Wilson... Volney... Bridle Creek... Stratford... Twin Oaks... and Scottville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
